original_content:
FROM node:latest

# Instala curl sin versión fijada ni --no-cache
RUN apk add curl

USER root

# Ejecuta como root (por defecto)
CMD ["sh"]
suggested_content:
# SUGERENCIA: evita usar 'latest'
FROM node:<TAG>

# Instala curl sin versión fijada ni --no-cache
RUN apk add curl

# SUGERENCIA: evita usar 'root'
USER appuser

# Ejecuta como root (por defecto)
CMD ["sh"]

hadolint.message: Using latest is prone to errors if the image will ever update. Pin the version explicitly to a release tag
Use the `--no-cache` switch to avoid the need to use `--update` and remove `/var/cache/apk/*` when done installing packages
Pin versions in apk add. Instead of `apk add <package>` use `apk add <package>=<version>`
Last USER should not be root
